jdbcService.sql: select distinct g.id, gr.created, gr.modified, gr.started, gr.stopped, gr.service, gr.inherit, gr.group_id, gr.role_id, gr.node_id, context.name, owner.id, case when u.alias is not null then u.alias else owner.name end, g.name, gr.id from groups g join group_roles gr on g.id = gr.group_id left outer join nodes owner on owner.id = g.owner_id left outer join nodes context on context.id = gr.node_id left outer join users u on owner.id = u.id where gr.role_id = :roleId and (:name is null or g.name ilike '%' || :name || '%')
